description:
Sousuke Kaburaya, an impoverished detective, met Sara, a princess from another world with magical powers.

Sara began living with Sousuke, and she quickly adjusted to life in modern Japan.
Meanwhile, Livia, a female knight who came from the same world as Sara, found herself lost and homeless, but surprisingly enjoyed her days here.

These two people, who live a positive life despite their situation, began to have an impact on Sousuke and the other oddballs in the neighborhood, including a devilish lawyer, a divorce agent, and a cult leader.

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)
hashtag: #変サラ #変人のサラダボウル

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Adoption
tags.description: Features a character who has been adopted by someone who is neither of their biological parents.

tags.name: Homeless
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is homeless.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Detective
tags.description: Features a character who investigates and solves crimes.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Crime
tags.description: Centers around unlawful activities punishable by the state or other authority.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Gambling
tags.description: Centers around the act of gambling.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

name.native: リヴィア・ド・ウーディス

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hirasakayomi)

Yomi Hirasaka begin their debut as novelist in 2004 from the Light Novel series "Haunted!" that won MF Bunko 0th J-Light Novel Newcomer Award (Japanese: 第0回MF文庫Jライトノベル新人賞). The pen name Yomi Hirasaka used derived from the Japanese mythological slope in the realm of underworld called "Yomotsu-Hirasaka" (黄泉平坂).

__Currently living:__ Saitama Prefecture, Japan

Kantoku is an illustrator, artist, and key illustrator born March 26, 1985. He established, and is currently active in his own circle, 5nen me no Houkago (5年目の放課後, lit. 5th Year's After School). 

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kantoku_5th) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/1565632) | [Circle](http://5-y.2-d.jp/)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/56090532)

Originally an animator. Often works with [Makoto Moriwaki](https://anilist.co/staff/109581/).

**Hayato Numajiri** is a Japanese CG director.

**Education:** Kunitachi College of Music

[Staff Page (Nichion)](https://www.nichionsakka.com/hanae-nakamura)

Hanae Nakamura is a music composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/wanuka__) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCm7rYZ6xOw3m5GaTMuUJjVw)
 
He is a mysterious singer-songwriter who hasn't revealed his face or his background, only that he's a 22-year-old college student.
His distinctly Japanese, somehow nostalgic, musical style, and addictive melodies are drawing an enthusiastic response, mostly on social media.

The music video for his first original song, ["Tipsy"](https://youtu.be/Rq0NjgXSj0s), has surpassed 20 million views.

[Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxaLyJj2eG2cIe_1rcQ-gnw) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/MeiyoDensetsu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/MeiyoDensetsu/) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@meiyodensetsu)
5 piece band consisting of vocalist Kotani, guitarist [Kessaku](https://anilist.co/staff/335444/Kessaku), bassist Hidamari Yutari, drummer Oonami Melody and pianist Utakazu.
